mapper.select: select c.id, c.title, c.cover, c.lesson_num as lessonNum, s1.title as subjectParentTitle, s2.title as subjectTitle, t.name as teacherName, c.price from course as c LEFT OUTER JOIN subject as s1 on c.subject_parent_id=s1.id LEFT OUTER JOIN subject as s2 on c.subject_id=s2.id LEFT OUTER JOIN teacher as t on c.teacher_id=t.id where c.id=#{id}
